block.p: Laura Anne Dowden, a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Carroll V. Dowden of Saddle River, N.J., was married yesterday to Nigel Richard Edelshain, the son of Lisa Edelshain of Swansea, Wales, and the late Gerald Edelshain. Msgr. Robert Fuhrman performed the ceremony at St. Gabriel the Archangel Church in Saddle River.

Ms. Dowden, 35, is keeping her name. She is the publisher of Contemporary Surgery, a monthly magazine, in Montvale, N.J. She graduated from the University of Notre Dame. Her father is the president of Dowden Health Media, which publishes Contemporary Surgery and other magazines and newsletters, in Montvale.

Laura Anne Dowden, a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Carroll V. Dowden of Saddle River, N.J., was married yesterday to Nigel Richard Edelshain, the son of Lisa Edelshain of Swansea, Wales, and the late Gerald Edelshain. Msgr. Robert Fuhrman performed the ceremony at St. Gabriel the Archangel Church in Saddle River.

Ms. Dowden, 35, is keeping her name. She is the publisher of Contemporary Surgery, a monthly magazine, in Montvale, N.J. She graduated from the University of Notre Dame. Her father is the president of Dowden Health Media, which publishes Contemporary Surgery and other magazines and newsletters, in Montvale.

The bridegroom, 36, is a founder and owner of EBmatch, a New York company that works with businesses and Web site developers. He graduated from the University of Edinburgh and received an M.B.A. from the Wharton School at the University of Pennsylvania. He is president of the Wharton Club of New York. His father owned Goldsmiths and Silversmiths Association, a former jewelry and china shop in London. The bridegroom's mother, who is retired, was an officer of the Order of St. John of Jerusalem.
